meanings.definition: The quality or state of being sizable.
meanings.sent1: The sizableness of the cake made it perfect for sharing at the party.
meanings.sent2: I was impressed by the sizableness of the new library in town.
meanings.sent3: The sizableness of the puppy's ears made everyone giggle.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room with a sizableness that was contagious.
meanings.sent5: The sizableness of the mountain took my breath away.

meanings.definition: The extent or magnitude of being sizable.
meanings.sent1: We marveled at the sizableness of the fish we caught.
meanings.sent2: The sizableness of the project overwhelmed us at first.
meanings.sent3: The sizableness of the ice cream cone made it a challenge to finish.
meanings.sent4: His voice carried a sizableness that commanded attention.
meanings.sent5: The sizableness of the tree's shadow provided relief from the sun.
